text: {| |} The Europa Elite is a new British, single-engined kit aircraft design, under development in 2020 by Europa Aircraft. The aircraft will fit the into the EASA CS-VLA category and will be of all-composite construction, with a low-wing, tricycle gear and two seats in side-by-side configuration.Light Aviation magazine - May 2020 A stablemate of the Europa XS, the Elite features a T-tail and elliptical wings and tailplane. Three different sizes of engine will be available: , or , giving maximum top speeds of , and , respectively. ==Specifications== ==References== ==External links== * Category:2020s British sport aircraft Category:Homebuilt aircraft Category:Light-sport aircraft Category:Low-wing aircraft Category:Single-engined tractor aircraft
title: Europa Elite
